body.p: The draft Interpretation did not address the accounting for levies that are triggered if a minimum revenue threshold is reached. However, many respondents to the draft Interpretation emphasised the importance of providing guidance on this issue. The Interpretations Committee agreed with the respondents’ comments and concluded that this Interpretation should provide guidance on the accounting for levies with minimum thresholds. The Interpretations Committee decided that the accounting for the liability to pay such levies should be consistent with the principles established in paragraphs 8 and 11 of this Interpretation.
